sentences.sContent: Strategic policy during the War was vitiated because of a sharp division between easterners and westerners.
sentences.sCn: 由于“东方人”和“西方人”间的巨大分歧，战争期间的战略方针没有得到切实的执行。

remMethod.val: viti (看作vitamin) + ate (使) → 服用过多维生素会损害健康 → 损害

trans.tranOther: to make something less effective or spoil it
